trans-unit.source: Represents a query that tests whether a message satisfies the requirements of a specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于测试消息是否满足指定的终结点地址的需求的查询。

trans-unit.source: This filter tests whether a message satisfies a particular endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 此筛选器测试消息是否满足特定终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> object includes a URI and an optional collection of addressing headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>对象包括一个 URI 和可选的寻址标头集合。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: The addressing and message headers are canonicalized in order to be compared for equality.
trans-unit.target: 寻址和消息标头进行规范化，以便可比较相等性。

trans-unit.source: If a parameter appears more than once in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>, the corresponding header must appear in the message at least that many times.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数显示将显示多个一次在<xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>，相应的标头必须显示在消息中至少相同的次数。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: IIS and the underlying file system (NTFS or FAT) are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: IIS 和基础文件系统 （NTFS 或 FAT） 不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: URI comparisons done by this class are also case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此类的 URI 比较也不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: So, for example, http://www.microsoft.com is evaluated as equal to http://WWW.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 因此，例如，http://www.microsoft.com 计算结果为相等 http://WWW.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter"></xref> class with a specified address against which to test a message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter"></xref>类使用用以测试消息指定的地址。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> against which messages are tested.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>测试的消息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: If you have a web service installed on your local machine, there are many equivalent ways to reference it, including the following: - http://localhost/foo.svc - http://192.168.1.100/foo.svc - http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc - http://[my-machine-name].[my-company].com/foo.svc.
trans-unit.target: 如果在本地计算机上安装的 web 服务，有多种等效方法引用该对象，其中包括:-http://localhost/foo.svc-http://192.168.1.100/foo.svc-http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc-http://[my-machine-name]。[my-company].com/foo.svc。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `includeHostNameInComparison` parameter is `false`, the above URIs all resolve to the same endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`includeHostNameInComparison`参数是`false`，则以上 Uri 都解析为相同的终结点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> against which messages are tested.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>测试的消息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the host name is included in the endpoint address comparison; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果主机名称包含在终结点地址比较中;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the address that the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter"></xref> tests messages against.
trans-unit.target: 获取的地址<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter"></xref>用以测试消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> that the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter"></xref> tests messages against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>， <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointAddressMessageFilter"> </xref>用以测试消息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the host name is included in the endpoint address comparison.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指示是否在终结点地址比较中包含的主机名。

trans-unit.source: If you have a web service installed on your local machine, there are many equivalent ways to reference it, including the following: - http://localhost/foo.svc - http://192.168.1.100/foo.svc - http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc - http://[my-machine-name].[my-company].com/foo.svc.
trans-unit.target: 如果在本地计算机上安装的 web 服务，有多种等效方法引用该对象，其中包括:-http://localhost/foo.svc-http://192.168.1.100/foo.svc-http://[my-machine-name]/foo.svc-http://[my-machine-name]。[my-company].com/foo.svc。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `false`, so the above URIs all resolve to the same endpoint, unless you change this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是`false`，因此除非你更改此属性，上面的 Uri 都解析为相同的终结点。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the host name is included in the endpoint address comparison; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果主机名称包含在终结点地址比较中;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a message satisfies the specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 测试消息是否满足指定终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: The two overloads of this method are equivalent because they both examine only message headers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的两个重载是等效的因为它们都只检查消息头。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> object to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>测试的对象</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> object satisfies the endpoint address specified in the filter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>对象满足筛选器; 中指定的终结点地址否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: message is .
trans-unit.target: messageis .

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a buffered message satisfies the specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 测试缓冲的消息是否满足指定终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: The two overloads of this method are equivalent because they both examine only message headers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的两个重载是等效的因为它们都只检查消息头。

trans-unit.source: The only reason to use this overload is if you already had a `messageBuffer` available and not a message, because this method converts the `messageBuffer` into a message.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此重载的唯一原因是如果您已经有`messageBuffer`可用而非消息，因为此方法将转换`messageBuffer`到一条消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> object to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>测试的对象</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> object satisfies the endpoint address; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>对象满足终结点地址; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>

trans-unit.source: messageBuffer is .
trans-unit.target: messageBufferis .
